page.title: 02RELIGION
page.content: We talked to Colin Slough the{VICAR}of Christ Church and St John's Church in Sandown about{RELIGION.} He enjoys being a vicar because every day is different. Today he brought the children to school and then dictated some letters and then took a service at{CHURCH.} Afterwards he popped into the mothers club. Tomorrow could be totally different. Some days he likes his job and some days he doesn't. Sometimes he works from 7a.m. to 11a.m. If someone isn't well they go to him. He has two churches and in the Winter he gets 60 to 70 people on Sundays. In the Summer he gets lots of extras. He has to think of both churches the same amount. At St. John's Church he needs thousands of pounds to spend on the{BUILDING.}
